zyklone.LEDCloud.patterns

Class DotPattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • zyklone.LEDCloud.patterns.Pattern
      • zyklone.LEDCloud.patterns.LocalPattern
        • zyklone.LEDCloud.patterns.DotPattern

  • public class DotPattern
extends LocalPattern
    This specialization of LocalPattern represents a fully lit circle.
    Author:
    Zyklone

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • DotPattern

        public DotPattern(int pictureSizeX,
                  int pictureSizeY)
        This constructor initializes the Pattern with its default values.
        Parameters:
        pictureSizeX - the length in the x-axis of the led-matrix
        pictureSizeY - the length in the y-axis of the led-matrix

      • DotPattern

        public DotPattern(int pictureSizeX,
                  int pictureSizeY,
                  boolean backgroundPattern)
        This constructor initializes the Pattern with certain default values, depending on if it is part of a BackgroundPattern or not.
        Parameters:
        pictureSizeX - the length in the x-axis of the led-matrix
        pictureSizeY - the length in the y-axis of the led-matrix
        backgroundPattern - true, if this pattern is part of a BackgroundPattern, otherwise false

      • DotPattern

        public DotPattern(int pictureSizeX,
                  int pictureSizeY,
                  int maxLifetimeInMs,
                  java.lang.Integer maxSize,
                  java.lang.Float maxVelocity,
                  java.lang.Float maxAcceleration,
                  java.lang.Float averageGlow,
                  boolean backgroundPattern)
        This constructor allows the passed parameters to set most of the object's attributes. If a null value is passed, the corresponding attributes are set to null (except for the size, which would be initialized with a default value). If an invalid value is passed, the corresponding attributes are initialized with default values.
        Parameters:
        pictureSizeX - the length in the x-axis of the led-matrix
        pictureSizeY - the length in the y-axis of the led-matrix
        maxLifetimeInMs - the maximum lifetime the instance of this class should have
        maxSize - the maximum size this pattern should have
        maxVelocity - the the maximum velocity this pattern should have
        maxAcceleration - the the maximum acceleration this pattern should have
        averageGlow - a rough value of the amount of glow this pattern should have
        backgroundPattern - true, if this pattern is part of a BackgroundPattern, otherwise false

    • Method Detail

      • drawPattern

        protected void drawPattern()
        Draws the pattern in the form of a dot / fully filled circle with the size-attribute as its diameter.
        Specified by:
        drawPattern in class LocalPattern
